message: I'm feeling generous, but I'm also pretty sure this money is mine.  Let's get this over with quickly.
Alice, let's be reasonable.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option. I'm willing to take a slightly higher amount to end this quickly.
I'm still not happy with that split.  Let's try to be a bit more even-handed this time.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you more than half! Take the deal before inflation eats away at the value any further.
